SEARCH

Uses of Class
com.project.moviebooking.dto.AuthenticationResponse

Packages that use AuthenticationResponse
Package
Description
com.project.moviebooking.controller
The "controller" package houses the controllers responsible for handling incoming HTTP requests and managing the flow of movie booking operations within the application.
com.project.moviebooking.service
The "service" package contains service interfaces and implementations responsible for implementing business logic and orchestrating operations within the movie booking application.
com.project.moviebooking.service.impl
The "impl" (Implementation) package contains concrete implementations of service interfaces responsible for executing business logic and operations within the movie booking application.

  • Uses of AuthenticationResponse in com.project.moviebooking.controller

    Methods in com.project.moviebooking.controller that return types with arguments of type AuthenticationResponse
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.forgetPassword(String emailId)
    This method is used in the case when the user forgets the password and requires to set a new password.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.login(AuthenticationRequest data)
    This method is used for logging into the system.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.refreshToken(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
    This method is used for refreshing the access token which is done by using the refresh token.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.resendOTP(String emailId)
    This method is used for resending the OTP in the case of verifying the user when the use may not get the OTP mail.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.signup(UserRequest userRequest)
    This method is used for signing up of the user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.verifyOtpForgetPassword(String emailId, String otp, String password)
    This method is used for verifying the OTP for the password change, if the OTP matches then the new password is set.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    AuthController.verifyUser(String emailId, String otp)
    This method is used for verifying the email of the user, using the otp that was sent to the mail.

    Methods in com.project.moviebooking.service that return types with arguments of type AuthenticationResponse
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.createUser(UserRequest userRequest)
    Creates a new user based on the provided user details.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.forgotPassword(String emailId)
    Initiates the password reset process for a user based on the provided email ID.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.login(AuthenticationRequest request)
    Authenticates a user based on the provided credentials.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.refreshToken(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
    Refreshes the authentication token for a user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.sendOtpAgain(String emailId)
    Sends an OTP again for a specific email ID as part of the forget password process.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.verifyForgetPassword(String emailId, String otp, String password)
    Verifies the password reset request using the provided email ID, OTP, and new password.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserService.verifyUser(String emailId, String otp)
    Verifies a user based on the provided email ID and OTP.

  • Uses of AuthenticationResponse in com.project.moviebooking.service.impl

    Methods in com.project.moviebooking.service.impl that return types with arguments of type AuthenticationResponse
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.createUser(UserRequest userRequest)
    Creates a new user with the provided user details and sends an OTP for verification.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.forgotPassword(String emailId)
    Initiates the password reset process by sending an OTP to the user's email.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.login(AuthenticationRequest request)
    Logs in a user with the provided credentials and generates access and refresh tokens.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.refreshToken(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
    Generates a new access token using the refresh token for an authenticated user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.sendOtpAgain(String emailId)
    Resends an OTP for verification to the user's email.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.verifyForgetPassword(String emailId, String otp, String password)
    Verifies the provided OTP and changes the user's password if the OTP matches.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse>
    UserServiceImpl.verifyUser(String emailId, String otp)
    Verifies a user's email using the provided OTP.
